div.div: Lohn ISD Has 2020 Vision For Success

Lohn ISD is back in full swing for the spring semester and so excited to welcome back our students. We started the year off great by celebrating our 3rd Six Week Eagle Leaders : HS â Carmen Aguilar and Taylor Bass, 8th grade Cody Pennington, 7th Grade Evangeline Escobedo, 6th Grade Kadin Reeves, 5th Grade Ariana Smith, 3rd and 4th Grade Kaylin Reeves, 2nd grade Jaecee Curry, 1st grade Shelby Wharton and PK-K Brynlee Sparks.

Students will not physically report to school this week Please read the document below for information about Lohn ISD strategy this week.

div.a: Today's Basket Ball Games Moved Up

br.p: Today's games between Lohn and Olfen have been moved to 5 PM for the girls and 6 PM for the boys.
Freezing weather conditions delays start of school to 10 AM Wednesday Morning.

The Junior High Basketball games between Lohn and Panther Creek that were scheduled for tonight have been cancelled. The games have been rescheduled for Thursday night, January 23rd, at 6 PM. Games to be played at Lohn ISD.
